body:
This is cool little thing that google has made, where basically it turns images into... weird, interesting, and sometimes horrifying pictures.
Here you go: https://dreamscopeapp.com/create (If I were you I wouldn't go into the gallery section, there are some noticeably inappropriate pictures)  

Example:

The original? A simple minecraft screenshot
